channel.title: Upgrade current pc
channel.description:
Hello i'm going to upgrade my PC later this summer and I need help what should I do? Here are my buying specs. I have two gtx 280's so far and a core 2 duo wolfdale.
What I want: the best Core i7 prossesor, and an antec 1200 case.
[img]https://img3.imageshack.us/img3/9099/1200frontqlights.jpg[/img]
[img]https://www.techlivez.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/08/intelcore-i7extreme.jpg[/img]
Also what motherboard should I use? And what cooler should I get for my core i7 when I buy it.
Thank you your answers are very helpful.
